headline: Network flow monitoring is GA, providing end-to-end traffic visibility
keywords: Magic Network Monitoring, Network Services, Magic Transit, Magic WAN, Product News
description: Network engineers often need better visibility into their networkâ€™s traffic when analyzing DDoS attacks or troubleshooting other traffic anomalies. To solve this problem, Cloudflare offers a network flow monitoring product that gives customers end-to-end traffic visibility across their network.
